SELECT a.*,d.user_id,d.username,d.img,d.realname,d.parent_id , (CASE WHEN FIND_IN_SET(b.user_id,read_user_ids)>0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as is_read FROM wk_oa_announcement AS a LEFT JOIN wk_admin_user as d on a.create_user_id=d.user_id LEFT JOIN wk_admin_user as b on FIND_IN_SET(b.user_id,a.owner_user_ids) LEFT JOIN wk_admin_dept as c on FIND_IN_SET(c.dept_id,a.dept_ids) WHERE 1=1 and (c.dept_id=#{deptId} or b.user_id=#{userId} or (a.owner_user_ids ='' and a.dept_ids ='') or a.create_user_id=#{userId})
and a.start_time < NOW() and a.end_time>NOW()
and (a.start_time > NOW() or a.end_time <NOW())
group by a.announcement_id order by a.announcement_id desc
